list_definition.definition: a usually large board eg in a hall, school etc on which notices are put; bulletin board American

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She left a message on the school noticeboard.

list_ex_of_english: Dragonsmagic was, until it closed down in late 2007, a community noticeboard for collectors to leave messages for each other.
A noticeboard showing these details is situated on the platform.
There are many interesting buildings in or around the village centre (a useful map can be found at the noticeboard near the green).
There was no written instruction, nothing pinned up on a noticeboard.
Carter used the hotel's noticeboard to deliver occasional news and information on the discovery.
As well, it provided a community noticeboard.
A noticeboard with times of access would be useful.
One nurse is responsible for keeping a noticeboard, another to keep nurses updated on training opportunities; another is responsible for coordinating meetings.
